title: jayatu gOkulavAsa
sahitya:
jayatu gOkulavAsa.  rAgA:  saurASTra.  jhampe tALA.


1:  jayatu gOkulavAsa daitya pUtaniya nAsha jayatu klEsha vinAsha sarvalOkEsha
 caraNam 2    jayatu rukmiNinATha anAtharige nAtha jayatu madhuranAtha pAlisO dAta
 caraNam 3    jayatu pAvanagAtra cArutara cAritra jayatu jalajA nEtra muninutipAtra
 caraNam 4    jayatu sAvira nAma nIDenage parandhAma jayatu sArvabhauma bhaktiyadu parama
 caraNam 5    jayatu tulasIhAra divyadondAkAra jayatu ninna vicAra adu balu apAra
 caraNam 6    jayatu pANDava pakSa tuNTayOdhana shikSa jayatu lOkAdhyakSa dharma samrakSa
 caraNam 7    jayatu shrI bhUlOla bhakta jana paripAla jayatu pAvanashIla tande purandara viTTala
